text: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
author: L. Wolfe Gilbert

text: All the beauty of the world, 'tis but skin deep.
author: Ralph Venning

text: Beauty is the still birth of suffering, every woman knows that.
author: Emily Prager

text: I feel by posing for Playboy I've discovered my own sexuality and beauty, and I feel more confident than ever.
author: Heather Kozar

text: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
author: John Wooden
